comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: digitalgallery.nypl.org/nypldigital/dgkeysearchdetail.cfm... in what seems to be the same photo, but from a print publication, identifies him as the owner of the Boston "Traveler" and recently elected President of the U.S. Chamber of Commerce (at an unspecified date).

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: John H. Fahey (1873-1950); his papers are at the FDR Library: docs.fdrlibrary.marist.edu:8000/findbrow.cgi?collection=F....

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Later, according to www.fdrlibrary.marist.edu/archives/pdfs/findingaids/findi... he was chairman of the Federal Home loan Board.
